ComicInfo.Title: The Plague Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE PLAGUE - PART ONE
Since Robyn Locksley and Marian Quin set up shop in New York City, the Cabal has been a mystery to them. Are they a cult? Are they gods? No one in the city - not even Robyn's most connected sources - knows. But that's all about to change.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tony Brescini & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Abhishek Malsuni & Shashank Mishra | 2 | C | Cover C | Pasquale Qualano & Alessia Nocera | 3 | RE | Year10 Photo Shoot Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | 4 |
